attributes.action: Create a greener society and become a self sufficient country not depending on food and energy imports
attributes.additional_details: Petition for the government to wake up and realise that without a clean and stable environment, it cannot produce a economical, sustainable and viable country . The environment is everything to us, at the end of the day its where we live and breathe and bring up our families, but with pollution and global warming it puts everyone under threat. At the same time of becoming a greener country we should become  energy and food self sufficient cause we cannot depend on imports in an ever changing world both politically and environmentally.
